array.name: arguments
array.item: My stress reactions mean that I am a weak person.
People cannot be trusted.
I will never be able to feel normal emotions again.
I have no future.
I will not be able to tolerate my thoughts and I will fall apart.
Nothing good can happen to me anymore.
My reactions since the event mean that I am going crazy.

array.name: ca0
array.item: Like most people, I am sometimes weak and sometimes strong; I’m not a weak person in all situations.
Calling myself weak will not help me get through this.
I’m a human being.
My reactions are common among trauma survivors and don’t mean that I am weak.
I can take action to act in a way that I respect.
I am a good person.
It’s okay to feel weak sometimes, I’m only human.
It’s a myth that it’s possible to be strong in all situations.
I can begin to feel strong again.
I am doing things that a strong person does.
I will feel stronger as time passes and I recover.

array.name: ca1
array.item: Many people can be trusted, some cannot.
It’s common to have trouble trusting other people after being harmed by others.
I can take things slowly with other people.
Just because I feel that other people cannot be trusted doesn’t mean it’s true.
I can learn to trust in a way that is safe.
I don’t have to trust everyone, just some special people.

array.name: ca2
array.item: No one can predict how I will feel in the future.
Just because I feel this way doesn’t mean it’s true.
My trauma emotions are normal.
How I feel is normal under the circumstances.
Many things about me are good.
Trauma survivors can recover but recovery takes time.
I’m still a good person.
My emotional life can recover with time.

array.name: ca3
array.item: The future has not yet been written.
Just because I feel this way doesn’t mean it’s true.
I can take action to build a future for myself.
My life has been harmed but I will not let it be destroyed.
I am a good person and good things can happen to me.
Some good things are happening to me now and more will happen in the future.
Feeling this way does not mean it’s true.

array.name: ca4
array.item: Just because I get upset doesn’t mean I will fall apart.
It’s normal to have difficulty coping with traumatic memories.
It’s okay to feel afraid.
If I fall apart, it’s not the end of the world.
I can learn to tolerate my emotions.
My intense emotions are not dangerous.

array.item: The future has not yet been written.
